mapper.select: select sku_code, shop_num, business_code, order_user_id, id, is_delete, created_time, created_by, updated_time, updated_by from t_sys_shopping_car where is_delete=0 and sku_code=#{skuCode} and business_code=#{businessCode} and order_user_id=#{orderUserId}
mapper.insert: insert into t_sys_shopping_car( sku_code, shop_num, business_code, order_user_id, is_delete, created_time, created_by ) values ( #{skuCode}, 1, #{businessCode}, #{orderUserId}, 0, now(), #{createdBy} )
mapper.select: select tssc.sku_code, tssc.shop_num, tssc.business_code, tssc.order_user_id, tssc.id, tssc.is_delete, tssc.created_time, tssc.created_by, tssc.updated_time, tssc.updated_by, tsg.sku_name, tsg.sale_price from t_sys_shopping_car tssc inner join t_sys_goods tsg on tssc.sku_code=tsg.sku_code where tssc.is_delete=0 and order_user_id=#{userId}
mapper.delete: delete from t_sys_shopping_car where is_delete=0 and order_user_id=#{id}
